text:
e="preserve">Merengnnakuge Tennison Cooray (සිංහල:ටෙනිසන් කුරේ) (30 April 1952 – 28 September 2020) was a Sri Lankan comedian and actor. He was born in Moratuwa, Sri Lanka. Cooray was known for his roles as Miguel in the "Re Daniel Dawal Migel" movie series, his small roles in the "Cheriyo" movie series and as Bean in "Somy Boys".
Cooray died on 28 September 2020 in Colombo, Sri Lanka from a heart attack, aged 68.
